name: Balinese Incense pack of 12
description:
These are honestly the most magical and potent incense I have ever used. I found these in Bali from a woman who rolls all of her own using only pure ingredients meaning no toxins are burning while lit. They are simply divine!

I hand chose three different scents from her Bali Spirit, Ritual Essence and Sacred Flowers. Each pack comes with 4 different sticks of each. They are super thick and long burning. They also come in a gorgeous Balinese fabric pouch which I made. Once you smell these, theres no turning back! : )

name: 2 bundles of white California Sage
description:
This listing is for two white sage bundles gathered by myself from my families land in California. White sage used for cleansing and purification. Use it to cleanse your home, self or any environment from all types of negativities dwellings surrounding. 

This type of white sage (salvia apiana) has an amazing wonderful strong scent, and is very powerful for cleansing. The bundle measures approximately 5 to 7 inches long, and good for several uses. 

Sage bundles are used to burn, then fan the smoke on tools, onto a person, and around an area to purify and cleanse it from negative energies.

They are easy to use. Light the top of the bundle carefully that you won't get burn, then blow out the flame and allow to smolder. Place the bundle on a shell or a heatproof vessel, then walk around the environment with the intention to be cleansed and purified fanning the smoke with a feather or with your hand. When you are done cleansing, place the smoking end in sand or water. 

Larger Quantities are available please contact me for a custom listing!

name: Daughter of the Sun offering pouch
description:
This beautiful IKAT offering pouch is one of my favorite creations.  I have dreamt of making these little bags since the last time I was in Peru.  When making a despacho ceremony, the shamen use these small bags filled with rainbow confetti and other herbs.  This is my Northern version.
Inside are sacred treasures collected from my travels over the last five years.  These are great little on the go ceremony bags.  Perfect for cleansing and purification.  I love to use them when I am out in nature as an offering to Pacha Mama.  They are also great used in prayer bundles. If you want to start making sacred ceremony or offerings and are not sure how, this is the perfect little tool! 

~For more information on how to use the pouches...  please visit my blog @ http://www.daughterofthesun77.blogspot.com/2012/06/daughter-of-sun-offering-pouch.html

Pouch includes:

Palo santo sticks from Peru
Copal from Guatemala
1 Tobacco stick from the Peruvian amazon (mapacho)
Cocoa Leafs from Peru
White Sage leaves from California
Roses from New Zealand
Jasmine from Bali
Seashells from Kauai and New Zealand
Purple Corn from Peru
Cacao from Bali
Mixture of herbs  from Peru


These make beautiful gifts as well!
Pouch measures 4 1/2 x 7"
*** Pouch now comes in IKAT print!!

name: Organic cradle cap oil
description:
This is a great cure for cradle cap! This 2 OZ bottle of organic herbs is perfect for those little ones. Herbs included are mullein, camomile, lavender and comfrey. Solar steeped in a gentle olive oil base. 

** Place oil on babies head and let soak for 10 minutes. Comb through with a comb and rinse! Cradle cap comes off with ease.

name: Organic baby bootie balm
description:
This is a beautiful blend of all natural oils and herbs. A perfect balm for the babe. I use this salve on my daughter for everything. Feels amazing esp on the booty when a rash has appeared.
All ingredients come straight from the earth. No chemicals or harmful additives. 
Made with apricot oil, calendula, lavender, cumfrey, camomile, roses, vitamin e, aloe and beeswax. Essential oils of lavender and a bit of tea tree. So simple and so nurturing for the skin! 1 oz size jar also available in 8 oz Jar for 32.00

name: Palo Santo Wood with pouch
description:
~Ohhh, the sacred Palo Santo. Such a powerful wood! 

This listing is for a rainbow pouch filled with Palo Santo. The pouch is great to hold crystals or other offerings as well. Each pouch contains 5 to 7 sticks measuring 3 1/2 to 4".

Used for thousands of years by the Indigenous Peoples of the Amazon for its medicinal properties and fragrance, Palo Santo truly deserves its name as the "Holy Wood".
Spiritually, Palo Santo is often used for purification, meditation, to increase flow of the bodies energy, and to ward off bad energy/spirits, and calamity.

*** these particular pouches have sold out. New pouches are similar but not exact in color!

name: Q'eros beaded bracelet
description:
These beautiful bracelets are one of my favorite Inca treasures. These come from the Q'eros tribe high up in the Andes. A woman I work with created these beauties in such a short period of time. The weaving skills of some of these woman blow my mind! I have had my bracelet on for four years now and have never taken it off. Its so solid and beautifully made. Wear separate or layer a few! I also use these to wrap my offerings in along with a small manta cloth.
~Approx 24" and wrap around all different sizes of wrists. 
~ These come in all sorts of colors so please specify your favorites and I will do my best to get you a beauty that feels right for you.

name: Shipibo medicine pouch
description:
This is a one of a kind crystal ceremonial pouch that i designed using art from the Indigenous, Amazonian, Shipibo tribe from Peru and the Native Americans from the North. Marrying the Northern and Southern Sacred energies together. The Eagle and the Condor meet here at the heart space. Hand stitched and beaded together to create the perfect ceremony piece . Big enough to hold offerings, medicine, crystals and prayers! 


Made with brain tanned buckskin, seed beads and a turquoise stone. This is the highest quality of leather created.  The process of tanning the hide was filled with prayers, gratitude and light in all directions. Inside is a crystal token of love.
Pouch is 4 1/4 x 2 , 2 x 7 1/2 with fringe. 
* small crystal included!

Big enough to hold offerings, medicine, crystals and prayers! 

Made with brain tanned buckskin, seed beads and a turquoise stone.  This is the highest quality of leather and the process of creating this leather is surrounded with many prayers, gratitude and light. Inside is a crystal token of love.

name: Flower print Balinese Sarong
description:
These unique Balinese sarongs can be used in so many different ways.  This particular sarong is a traditional balinese print.
Living on the islands I am never without my sarong.  You can tie them in a handful of ways, use them as towels, alter cloths, table cloths, shawls...  the possibilities are endless.  Every woman deserves a great sarong! 

Here is a great article in Harpers Bazaar on how to tie a sarong. http://www.harpersbazaar.com/fashion/fashion-articles/how-to-tie-sarong#slide-1

aloha! 

Measures 39 x 77"

Look shot by Amanda Charchian
Model~ Nathalie Kelley
Makeup~ Naked Eye Beauty
Styling~ Prism of Threads and Daughter of the Sun

Will fit all hats and is adjustable.
Can also be used as a headband!

name: Organic sacred herb earth mask
description:
This is a beautiful blend of all natural herbs. A perfect mask for every skin type. All ingredients come straight from the earth. No chemicals or harmful additives. 
Made with purple corn from the Sacred Valley in Peru, spirulina from Hawaii, dried roses, lavender, white clay and oats! So simple and so nurturing for the skin!
~Comes in an 4 oz jar

name: Shipibo Manta cloth in White
description:
These fabrics are hand dyed by the Indigenous Shipibo Women of the Peruvian Amazon.  This technique is a very ancient in which the women embroider or paint the visions they receive during Medicine Ceremony.  These weavings are all one of a kind and take weeks, even sometimes months to make.  We work with a family in the amazon to bring you these magical weavings.  

Manta is similar to the rust and purple one.   The manta will ship from California so photos are not available just yet. 
~manta is shown in bottom of first photograph on right top hand or photo!

Measures 54 x 54"
